name: fnaf - michael's adventure
description:
michael's adventure what is this about?

michael is just 10 years old and, boy, life isn't easy when your siblings aren't... um, not gonna write that here, and your dad is a walking purple contradiction!

i'm working on this slowly in my free time, but i think it's getting somewhere! i have an outline of the whole thing so i'm just sticking to it. it's meant to follow michael since he's 10 years old until he is 15 and-- well, 1983, you know what happens

op's words

if you have any questions/thoughts/criticism, don't hesitate to tell me through my tumblr, my instagram OR just commenting here in itch.io!

i showed this project to my friends and they gave me the courage to post this, so i hope you enjoy it and thank you so much for reading <3
